name: Acquisition and Analysis of Ex Vivo MRI and Neuropathology in healthy and VCID subjects
citation: Evancic, Kathryn (2025) Acquisition and Analysis of Ex Vivo MRI and Neuropathology in healthy and VCID subjects (Version draft) [Data set]. DANDI Archive. https://dandiarchive.org/dandiset/001437/draft
description: This dataset includes 7T MRI (Magnetic resonance imaging), 3T diffusion MRI, and neuropathological imaging of ex vivo brain samples that includes both controls and samples with cognitive impairment and dementia.
